text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! You stand within 
the venue of the Trainer Exam!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
The aim here is to bolster the training 
capabilities you hold for your trainee! 
I urge you to take on this challenge!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
For now! The only thing to do is practice. 
You are free to eliminate your weak points, 
or focus on maximizing your strengths.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I have arranged for rewards, 
so you are free to use them as motivation 
as well!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Rouse yourself! Your hard work is sure 
to be a source of pride for your trainee!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Encouragement! I sincerely wish 
for the advancement of your skills! 
Ha-ha-ha-ha!
